channel.title: Servial questions
channel.description:
hey Moparscape guys,
1. How to change the max hit of a NPC
2. How to let a NPC hit with Mage, Range, Melee?
3. How to Change a npc's GFX (attacking with foot, like a crush)
4. how to make the NEW jad doing right GFX's cuz i cant see the attacks
Thanks guys

item.title: Servial questions
item.dc:creator: @Dennissuperm Dennissuperm
item.description:
@Dennissuperm wrote:

i could not find any of them but w/e

Read full topic

item.title: Servial questions
item.dc:creator: @_Jake2 `Jake
item.description:
@_Jake2 wrote:

Here is my list:

  1. Have you checked the tutorial section?

  2. Have you used the search button at the top right of the page to see if someone else already answered any of these?

  3. Finally have you used the all famous google?

I’m pretty sure you havn’t because the questions you asked are pretty common. So do the things in my list and then ask the remaining questions.

Read full topic
